Article Title: Shedeur Sanders and Travis Hunter to be enshrined during emotional Colorado spring game ahead of NFL dreams
Article Text:
Credit: Imagn Images

Travis Hunter and Shedeur Sanders get hero’s farewell as Colorado honors duo in style



Shedeur Sanders and Travis Hunter , two of college football ’s brightest stars, will be immortalized in Colorado Buffaloes history this Saturday as their jersey numbers—No. 2 and No. 12—are officially retired during the Spring Game. The duo, who propelled the University of Colorado to a new era of national relevance under head coach Deion Sanders , will return to Folsom Field for a ceremony that is as symbolic as it is historic.Shedeur Sanders and Travis Hunter weren’t just teammates—they were the beating heart of a Colorado program that underwent a dramatic transformation in just two seasons. In 2022, the Buffs posted a dismal 1-11 record. But after the arrival of Coach Prime and his talented son Shedeur, along with two-way phenom Travis Hunter, Colorado surged to 4-8 in 2023 and finished 2024 with a stunning 9-4 record—their best season since 2016.Travis Hunter’s 2024 season was nothing short of legendary. Dominating on both sides of the ball, he hauled in 96 receptions for 1,258 yards and 16 touchdowns while also recording 35 tackles, four interceptions, and 11 passes defensed as a lockdown corner. His efforts earned him a clean sweep of college football’s highest honors. “He became the most honored player in the history of college football in 2024,” the school noted, as he claimed the Heisman Trophy, the Walter Camp Award, and both the AP and Sporting News Player of the Year accolades. He also won the Paul Hornung Award—again—and was named the nation's best wide receiver and best defensive player.But Hunter’s brilliance extended beyond the field. He was named to the Academic All-American First Team and was honored as the Academic All-American of the Year, becoming only the second Colorado athlete to achieve that distinction. Over his collegiate career, he totaled 153 receptions, 1,989 yards, and 20 touchdowns on offense, while adding 67 tackles and seven interceptions defensively.His quarterback, Shedeur Sanders, made an equally significant mark. Often compared to top NFL talents, Sanders threw for 4,134 yards and 37 touchdowns in 2024, cementing his status as one of the top quarterbacks in the nation. Despite some variance in draft stock discussions, he's widely projected as the No. 2 QB in the class behind Cam Ward and has reportedly drawn strong interest from teams like the New York Giants and New Orleans Saints. The Pittsburgh Steelers, picking at No. 21, are also said to be in the mix.Both Sanders and Hunter are expected to be first-round picks in the upcoming NFL Draft , with Hunter potentially going in the top three. The Cleveland Browns have reportedly shown interest in the versatile Hunter, underscoring just how coveted he has become.With their jersey retirement , Shedeur Sanders and Travis Hunter join a revered group of Buffaloes legends—Byron White (No. 24), Joe Romig (No. 67), Bobby Anderson (No. 11), and Rashaan Salaam (No. 19). Notably, Salaam and Hunter now stand alone as the only Heisman winners in Colorado’s storied history.Also Read: "He will be the death of me": Joe Burrow steals the spotlight at Sam Hubbard’s wedding as a clip of him goes viral and fans are going crazy over it
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders and travis hunter will be immortalized in colorado buffaloes history as their jersey numbers are retired. The duo propelled the university of colorado to a new era of national relevance under head coach deion sanders. Both are expected to be first-round picks in the upcoming nfl draft.

Article Title: NFL isn't sold on making the Chiefs a holiday staple with yearly Christmas Day games
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Chiefs' Christmas wish may go ungranted as NFL hesitates on making it a tradition



NFL and Buffalo Bills schedule hints and predictions with Broadcast VP | Always Gameday in Buffalo

The Kansas City Chiefs have become an integral part of the NFL Christmas Day game schedule over the past two years, thrilling fans with high-profile matchups during the holiday season. As the NFL continues to expand its holiday presence—once dominated by the NBA—Kansas City has made it known they want to be the league’s go-to team for December 25 games. However, the NFL seems reluctant to solidify any such tradition just yet.Much like how the Detroit Lions and Dallas Cowboys have long-standing Thanksgiving game traditions, the Chiefs recently submitted a formal request to the NFL, expressing interest in becoming a permanent host team on Christmas Day. The logic is simple: Kansas City is arguably the league’s most marketable franchise at the moment. Between their dominance on the field—frequenting Super Bowls—and the off-field buzz created by stars like Travis Kelce and his high-profile relationship with Taylor Swift, the Chiefs are ratings gold.Yet, despite the appeal, the NFL is not ready to tie itself to one team. On the “It’s Always Gameday in Buffalo” podcast, Mike North, the NFL’s Vice President of Broadcast Planning and Scheduling, addressed the Chiefs' request and explained the league’s stance.“For a team like the Chiefs to volunteer for Christmas while they’re busy winning every other Super Bowl or whatever it is, and their tight end is dating the biggest pop star on the planet, sure, the league office would love for the Chiefs to host every year, thanks for volunteering, boys,” North said.“I’m not sure that’s gonna become a tradition quite the way Thanksgiving is. Think about what it took for that tradition, right? The Lions since the ‘30s, the Cowboys since the ‘60s,” North said. “We didn’t commit to a third site on Thanksgiving when we brought that back about 20 years ago. We’ve rotated that around. I imagine we’re gonna keep rotating Christmas around too.”The NFL's cautious approach is rooted in its desire to remain agile. Committing to a team for annual holiday games requires considering both short-term popularity and long-term viability. While the Chiefs are currently a juggernaut, North highlighted that the future is unpredictable.“I know the Chiefs are raising their hands supposedly, but that’s a lot to ask your fans to come out every year on Christmas,” North said. “Certainly, while you’re good and you’re winning AFC West titles and fighting for Super Bowl, it’s an easy give. Five years from now, after Patrick Mahomes retires and they’re not the perennial champion and in every AFC Championship game, I’m not sure we’d want to be married to a site. There are other teams that have raised their hands to become permanent hosts of things like Black Friday or Christmas, thus far we’ve avoided to committing to something like that.”This year, the NFL is upping the ante with a Christmas Day tripleheader, split between Netflix and Amazon. Kansas City featured in the past two Christmas slates—losing to the Raiders at home in 2023, and bouncing back with a dominant 29-10 win over the Steelers in Pittsburgh last year. But despite their consistent appearances and undeniable entertainment value, they are not guaranteed a repeat slot.As the NFL prepares to release its official schedule post-draft, fans of the Kansas City Chiefs will be watching closely. Will the reigning AFC powerhouse get the holiday spotlight once again? While the league remains non-committal, one thing is clear: the Chiefs are eager to make Christmas football a Kansas City tradition. Whether the NFL allows it to happen remains a storyline to follow in seasons to come.Also Read: Jayden Daniels' dance with mom Regina Jackson steals spotlight at Brandon Aiyuk’s wedding
Article Summary: The kansas city chiefs have become an integral part of the nfl christmas day game schedule over the past two years. The chiefs recently submitted a formal request to the nfl, expressing interest in becoming a permanent host team on christmas day.

Article Title: Did Aaron Rodgers just get rejected by the Vikings? Inside his Super Bowl pitch and what it means for his future
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Aaron Rodgers’ bold pitch: mentor J.J McCarthy, chase a ring

Steelers show interest, but no deal yet

Is the NFL moving on from its aging icons?

Aaron Rodgers is no stranger to headline-making decisions, but this offseason is shaping up to be one of the most unpredictable chapters of his storied career. Over a month into NFL free agency, the former Green Bay Packers and New York Jets quarterback remains unsigned — and his recent attempt to land with the Minnesota Vikings didn’t go as planned.According to sources close to the situation, Rodgers had his eyes set on joining the Vikings, a move that would have sent shockwaves through the NFC North. His plan? Serve as a mentor to the team’s young quarterback J.J. McCarthy while also leading a potential Super Bowl push. It was a strategic pitch — pairing his veteran leadership with the raw talent of a rookie in hopes of a deep playoff run.But the Vikings declined.Minnesota is choosing to go all-in on McCarthy, signaling confidence in the 2024 draft pick’s potential to grow into their long-term franchise QB. Rather than splitting the leadership or slowing McCarthy’s development, the Vikings opted to build around youth — a decision that many believe speaks volumes about the league’s shifting priorities.With the Vikings off the table, the Pittsburgh Steelers appear to be the only team showing serious interest in Rodgers. Still, no deal has materialized. The hesitation may be due to Rodgers’ injury history, high salary demands, or teams prioritizing long-term quarterback development over short-term wins.Rodgers, who threw for 3,897 yards and 28 touchdowns last season, clearly still has gas left in the tank. But at 41, he’s entering a market that seems more hesitant than ever to invest in aging superstars.The Vikings’ decision may mark a turning point in how NFL teams view older quarterbacks. Rather than chasing quick success with veterans, franchises are increasingly focusing on grooming young talent. It’s a tough reality for Rodgers, whose resume includes four MVPs and a Super Bowl title — but no current job.As the draft approaches and team strategies evolve, Rodgers could still find a landing spot. But for now, his future hangs in the balance, and one thing is clear: the league may be ready to move on, even if Rodgers isn’t.Also Read: New York Jets shock the NFL by cutting Aaron Rodgers and doubling down on Allen Lazard with $11M deal
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers is still unsigned over a month into nfl free agency. The former green bay packers and new york jets quarterback had his eyes set on joining the minnesota vikings. The vikings declined to sign rodgers, choosing to go all-in on j.j. mccarthy.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Who stands where after PBKS vs KKR match
Article Text:
Punjab Kings players (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Here's the updated

IPL 2025 points table

after the thriller today:

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings surged to fourth place in the Indian Premier League 2025 points table after pulling off a sensational 16-run win over Kolkata Knight Riders in a dramatic low-scoring clash at Mullanpur, Chandigarh on Tuesday.Defending a mere 111 — the lowest total ever successfully defended in IPL history — Punjab’s bowlers delivered a masterclass to bowl out KKR for just 95 in 15.1 overs. The victory marked PBKS's fourth win in six games, taking their tally to 8 points and significantly boosting their playoff hopes.Meanwhile, KKR slipped to sixth in the standings with six points from seven games. It was their fourth defeat of the season and a major blow to their momentum after looking comfortable in the early stages of the chase.Yuzvendra Chahal turned the game on its head with figures of 4/28, triggering a collapse after KKR were cruising at 62/2. Marco Jansen (3/17) and debutant Xavier Bartlett also played key roles in dismantling the batting order.Earlier, PBKS had stumbled from 39/0 to 111 all out, with Harshit Rana (3/25) and Varun Chakravarthy doing the damage. Despite the collapse, Punjab’s spirited defense sealed a crucial win and lifted them into the top four.
Article Summary: Punjab kings beat kolkata knight riders by 16 runs at mullanpur, chandigarh. Punjab's bowlers delivered a masterclass to bowl out kkr for just 95 in 15.1 overs. The victory marked pbks's fourth win in six games, taking their tally to 8 points.

Article Title: Anthony Davis becomes the first player in NBA history to record 23 points, 13 rebounds, 9 assists, and 7 blocks in under 30 minutes of play
Article Text: Anthony Davis delivered a historic performance against the Toronto Raptors, leading the Dallas Mavericks to a decisive victory. Davis showcased his all-around talent by accumulating 23 points, 13 rebounds, 9 assists, and 7 blocks in just thirty minutes. His impact extends beyond individual stats, enhancing the Mavericks' teamwork and competitiveness as they pursue a strong playoff run.
Article Summary: Anthony davis delivered a historic performance against the toronto raptors, leading the dallas mavericks to a decisive victory. Davis showcased his all-around talent by accumulating 23 points, 13 rebounds, 9 assists, and 7 blocks in just thirty minutes.

Article Title: "My career was taken from me”: Taylor Swift opened up about the emotional damage from Kanye West and Kim Kardashian feud in 2023
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

In 2023, Taylor Swift had confessed the trauma she went through because of Kanye West and Kim Kardashian



Kanye West is again back to targeting Taylor Swift



Taylor Swift and Kanye West have had a pretty complicated bond since their feud began in 2009. While both Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have kept themselves away from issuing any public statements, the billionaire pop star had admitted how much she had suffered previously because of Kanye West and his ex wife, famous socialite Kim Kardashian.In 2016, Taylor Swift found herself mentioned in Kanye West’s song, Famous, which became a huge hit. Kanye West had spoken about how Taylor Swift had consented to the rap about her which read as, “I feel like me and Taylor might still have s*x. Why? I made that b*tch famous (God damn) I made that b*tch famous”.This had gotten Kanye West brutally trolled but his ex wife Kim Kardashian had come to his rescue. The famous socialite and founder of SKIMS released the phone call recording between the pop star and Kanye West where it seemed like Taylor Swift had consented to being mentioned in his song.But later, it was found out that the released tape of their phone call was heavily edited.In 2023, in an interview with TIME, Taylor Swift spoke about the aftereffects and the trauma she went through because of Kim Kardashian and Kanye West.Taylor Swift said, “Make no mistake — my career was taken away from me. That took me down psychologically to a place I’ve never been before.”The billionaire pop star added, “You have a fully manufactured frame job, in an illegally recorded phone call, which Kim Kardashian edited and then put out to say to everyone that I was a liar.”She continued, “I moved to a foreign country. I didn’t leave a rental house for a year…I pushed away most people in my life because I didn’t trust anyone anymore. I went down really, really hard.”Nine years after that infamous phone call between Kanye West and Taylor Swift, the rapper again targetted the pop sensation.A few days ago he made sexually explicit posts about Taylor Swift’s life and even implied that Justin Bieber and Harry Styles have had s*x with Taylor.Kanye West also expressed a desire to have s*x with Taylor Swift as in one of the now deleted posts he had written, “IM MAD I HAVENT F***ED TAYLOR SWIFT … YET.”But Taylor Swift’s fans have not held back and has brutally trolled the famous rapper. As per Daily Mail, Travis Kelce wants to confront Kanye West and have a “man to man” conversation about this.For now, neither Taylor Swift nor her team has officially reacted to this.Also Read: “She ended him”: Taylor Swift didn’t respond to Kanye West but fans think she shut him down back in 2024
Article Summary: Taylor swift and kanye west have had a complicated bond since their feud began in 2009. In 2016, taylor swift found herself mentioned in kanye west’s song, famous. Kanye west had spoken about how taylor swift had consented to the rap about her which read as, “i feel like me and taylor might still have s*x”

Article Title: Vice President JD Vance drops Ohio State’s championship trophy during awkward White House moment
Article Text:
Credit: AFP

JD Vance mishandles Buckeyes’ championship trophy during White House event



JD Vance fumbles college football championship trophy as Ohio State visits White House

Vice President JD Vance stole the spotlight on Monday — not just for his speech, but for a slip-up that instantly went viral. While honoring the Ohio State Buckeyes ' national championship win on the White House South Lawn, Vance, a proud alumnus of the university, accidentally dropped the College Football Playoff’s national championship trophy in front of a crowd that included the team, President Donald Trump, and members of the media.The moment occurred as the ceremony drew to a close. In an enthusiastic gesture, Vance attempted to lift the impressive 3-foot trophy from a table onstage. TreVeyon Henderson, Ohio State’s standout running back, assisted by holding the top while Vance took the base. However, the trophy, a modular piece consisting of a 26.5-inch "ascending virtual football" made of 24-karat gold and stainless steel atop a 12-inch bronze base, unexpectedly split apart — and the base dropped with a loud thud.Gasps and laughter rippled through the audience as Henderson and another player managed to hold onto the top half of the trophy. Quick to recover from the embarrassing mishap, Vance picked up the base and later joined head coach Ryan Day in posing with the gleaming upper portion of the prize.True to form, the Vice President laughed off the incident online, quipping, “I didn’t want anyone after Ohio State to get the trophy so I decided to break it.” The moment, shared across social platforms, drew chuckles and headlines, and even drew comparisons to other infamous trophy blunders in sports history — from Maria Sharapova’s U.S. Open trophy toppling off in 2006 to Real Madrid's bus runover of the Copa del Rey in 2011.Despite the awkward turn, the event itself was filled with pride and celebration. Vance, who graduated from Ohio State in 2009 with a degree in philosophy and political science, welcomed the team alongside President Trump. The Buckeyes presented both with custom helmets and jerseys, adding a personal touch to their White House victory lap.As the U.S. Marine Band played “We Are the Champions,” the spirit of celebration never wavered — even if the trophy didn’t stay in one piece. The gaffe may have been unexpected, but it underscored JD Vance’s light-hearted persona, making the Vice President’s trophy fumble a uniquely memorable highlight of an already historic day.Also Read: “Coming soon”: With wedding bells in the air, Hailee Steinfeld’s cryptic post has fans guessing what's next
Article Summary: Ohio state vice president jd vance accidentally dropped the college football championship trophy. The gaffe occurred during a white house event honoring the buckeyes' national championship win. The vice president laughed off the incident online, quipping, "i didn't want anyone after ohio state to get the trophy so i decided to break it"

Article Title: “I legitimately cannot believe it’s real”: Wiley Ballard thrashed for picking phone numbers of female fans at the Braves vs Blue Jays game
Article Text:
“I legitimately cannot believe it’s real”: Wiley Ballard thrashed for picking phone numbers of female fans at the Braves vs Blue Jays game (Image Source: Getty)

Wiley Ballard being bashed for his pick-up scheme

“Okay, Wiley, you’ve got four innings to get the numbers,”

“This is one of the most insanely inappropriate things I’ve ever seen. Like I legitimately cannot believe it’s real."

“This is so unprofessional. Is this a club or live television of a MLB game. Yikes”

“Incredibly unprofessional and should not be encouraged or celebrated. Imagine the reaction if a woman sideline reporter did this.”

Supporters coming out in Wiley Ballard’s defense

“being unprofessional”

“He doesn't have bad-natured bone in his body”

“fine journalist.”

What was supposed to be a normal fan interaction went on to become another internet scandal. When the Atlanta Braves reporter, Wiley Ballard , was interviewing two female fans, he had no idea that a fun conversation would lead to fans slamming him all over social media.What happened on the sidelines of the Atlanta Braves vs Toronto Blue Jays match? Why did the ever-so-professional Wiley Ballard become the center of internet hate? We have the tidbits here!On April 14, 2025, when the Atlanta Braves were facing the Toronto Blue Jays at Toronto’s Rogers Center, the Braves’ broadcast team was playing another game on the sideline. The most professional reporter of the team, Wiley Ballard, was seen interviewing two female fans on the sidelines.The interview started off as a fun interaction which then took a turn of events when Brandon Gaudin pushed Wiley to get the girls’ numbers.said Gaudin, which seemed like some kind of insider bet.Ultimately Ballard got their numbers, and it seemed like the end of a fun interaction. However, social media took it to another level. Various fans and reporters started bashing Wiley, stating that it was highly inappropriate.Katie Feldman, the CBS MLB editor took to X to say,Another fan went on to say,Another user went on to comment,While a majority of the internet baseball fans came out to bash Wiley Ballard, there were tons of supporters as well. The GA Sportscaster of the Year had lots of people coming in to support and defend him oncomments and described how kind he actually is.One fan went on to say,referring to how professional Ballard is.Even Bill Shanks took to X and gave his statement on the scenario, calling Ballard aHowever, fans still remain torn due to Ballard’s recent act. Though Wiley Ballard is a fine reporter, his recent act raises questions about what is acceptable in the world of journalism and where one should draw boundaries.Also Read: Braves set to welcome back Spencer Strider after long injury break
Article Summary: Atlanta braves reporter wiley ballard was seen interviewing two female fans on the sidelines of the game. Ballard was pushed to get the girls' numbers by braves broadcaster brandon gaudin. Ballard got their numbers, and it seemed like the end of a fun interaction. However, social media took it to another level.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky’s daughter Paulina Gretzky shows up for her husband as eyes remain on her legendary father
Article Text:
Image via Ryan Remiorz/CP

Paulina Gretzky’s heartwarming gesture to her husband comes days after she kept quiet while Wayne Gretzky got trolled



Image via Michael Reaves/Getty Images

Wayne Gretzky ’s older daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has now been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, Dustin Johnson , as the two were spotted in Georgia for the Masters Tournament, which began on 10th April. Recently, a picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive Paulina Gretzky has been of her husband’s career.Paulina Gretzky and her husband, Dustin Johnson, were spotted before the tournament began on 10th April as Johnson participated in the Masters Par 3 Contest.Paulina Gretzky looked stunning as she wore a white shirt and pants along with white shoes and walked hand in hand with her husband as she carried his golf kit.Both looked happy as the two laughed and were seen speaking to each other. A few days ago, Paulina Gretzky was also seen at LIV Golf Miami to be with her husband. The two took a private jet from Miami and then landed in Augusta, Georgia where the Masters Tournament began from 10th April.The NHL legend, Wayne Gretzky, was last spotted when Alex Ovechkin tied with him at 894 goals. Wayne Gretzky was spotted cheering for Alex Ovechkin as the crowd gave him a standing ovation at the Chicago Blackhawks’ recent match.Wayne Gretzky complimented Alex Ovechkin’s efforts and said, “I can tell you firsthand I know how hard it is to get to 894, 895 is pretty special. They say records are meant to be broken, but I’m not sure who’s gonna get more goals than that.”Wayne Gretzky also made an appearance on TNT and said, “I was really happy for him, I felt like I scored the goal, does that make any sense? I know the pressure he was under, the microscope he was under, honestly I was relieved”.However, Wayne Gretzky’s children have stayed away from all the mess that the NHL legend had found himself in. Paulina Gretzky did not issue any statements when her father was getting trolled as fans believed that he supported Team USA at the 4 Nations Final match.The NHL legend has also not addressed the controversy in public and has kept himself away from all the mess as fans await for a statement from him.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Paulina Gretzky flaunts her luxurious life as Wayne Gretzky receives a standing ovation
Article Summary: Paulina gretzky has been spending time with her husband, professional golfer, dustin johnson. The two were spotted in augusta, georgia for the masters tournament, which began on 10th april. A picture of the two went viral and it shows how supportive she has been of her husband's career.

Article Title: Travis Hunter threatens with retirement if asked to play either offensive or defensive
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Travis Hunter)

Travis Hunter shares that he would retire if not allowed to play offensive and defensive

Travis Hunter made the headlines as he made an announcement that has taken fans and critics by surprise. He recently shared that if he is not allowed to play both defense and offense, he will retire from the game. Fans have had a mixed reaction to the news. While some have supported his firm decision, others question whether he is a team player. With weeks leading up to the drafting, it will be interesting to watch if his statement would impact the way events unfold. The 21-year-old, however, continues to be confident in the sport as a player who can nail both the offensive, as well, the defensive.In a recent interview with CBS Sports , Travis Hunter opened up about wanting to play on either side of the sport. When asked if he would choose either, he shared, "It's never playing football again." He continued to share, "Because I've been doing it my whole life, and I love being on the football field. I feel like I could dominate on each side of the ball, so I really enjoy doing it."Talking about how he has made his mark both on offense and defense, the 21-year-old shared, "I just feel very confident in myself, and I got a competitive spirit that I can do whatever I put my mind to, and I feel like I can do it."The official handle of MLFootball shared the news on their X handle, "BREAKING: TRAVIS HUNTER SAYS HE WILL RETIRE IF THE #NFL TEAM THAT DRAFTS HIM DOES NOT LET HIM PLAY OFFENSE AND DEFENSE. “It’s never playing football again.” - When asked if he’s not allowed to do both ... (Via CBS)" The social media post quickly became viral with fans supporting his decision in the comments.A user wrote, "Tbf it’d be gross negligence to not utilize him on both sides of the ball." On the other hand, others were left unsure about the maturity of his decision. A user wrote, "Man, he’s hurting his draft stock with comments like that. Show you’re a team player and ready to step up wherever the team needs you." Another wrote, "If I can’t play both I’ll play neither forever. Mature stance." Another user wrote, "He can retire and the game will continue like he was never there."Also Read: Modern two-way NFL players are rare - but Travis Hunter says he's ready to change that
Article Summary: Travis hunter made the headlines as he made an announcement that has taken fans and critics by surprise. The 21-year-old shared that if he is not allowed to play both defense and offense, he will retire from the game. Fans have had a mixed reaction to the news.

Article Title: Dak Prescott’s high-stakes comeback: Is the Cowboys’ $240M man ready to rise again?
Article Text:
Dak Prescott (Via: Getty Images)

Inside Dak Prescott’s rehab and what it means for the Cowboys



Severity of Dak Prescott's hamstring injury raises concerns | Pro Football Talk | NFL on NBC

“If I had to play a game today, I definitely could do that,”

2025: Boom or Bust for Prescott and Dallas?



The 2024 NFL season came crashing down for the Dallas Cowboys the moment Dak Prescott pulled up lame against the Atlanta Falcons. One play, one hamstring tear, and just like that Dallas’ hopes for a deep playoff run vanished. Now, with a $240 million contract on his shoulders and a legacy hanging in the balance, all eyes are on Prescott’s road to recovery and the Cowboys’ 2025 future.Prescott’s injury wasn’t your average muscle tweak. Diagnosed with a partial hamstring avulsion, a severe condition where the tendon detaches from the bone, the quarterback was ruled out for the rest of the 2024 season. The aftermath left Dallas scrambling, as backups Cooper Rush and Trey Lance tried (and failed) to steer the ship, leading the team to a disappointing 7-10 finish.Fast forward to the offseason, and the 32-year-old signal caller is inching closer to full strength. But he’s not rushing the process.Prescott revealed.This cautious yet confident approach shows Prescott is prioritizing longevity over bravado. And considering his injury history including a devastating ankle fracture in 2020 and calf and thumb issues in following seasons, he has every reason to tread carefully.Rehab has been intense, with a focus on restoring the mobility that made him a dual-threat quarterback. Running, agility drills, and controlled scrambles have been key as he works to regain form without risking reinjury.Prescott’s return isn’t just a comeback, it’s a high-stakes gamble for the Cowboys. His blockbuster four-year, $240 million contract extension, which includes a record-setting $231 million guaranteed, has put him at the heart of the franchise's future.If he returns to form, Dallas could re-emerge as a powerhouse in the NFC East. But if injuries continue to haunt him, the Cowboys could be staring at yet another lost season and serious questions about their long-term direction.Also Read: Jalen Ramsey trade rumors: Could Dolphins cornerback be on the move in 2025? For now, Prescott is betting on himself. He’s not just aiming to return, he’s aiming to lead, to win, and to silence every doubt.One leg, one season, one shot. Dak Prescott’s redemption tour is loading and the NFL better be ready.
Article Summary: Dak prescott has been ruled out for the rest of the 2024 season with a hamstring injury. The 32-year-old signal caller is inching closer to full strength. His four-year, $240 million contract extension includes a record-setting $231 million guaranteed. If he returns to form, dallas could re-emerge as a powerhouse in the nfc east.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, PBKS vs KKR: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
PBKS and KKR players after the match. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Does MS Dhoni have any luck left? Greenstone Lobo on CSK's 2025 chances!

Brief scores:

Punjab Kings:

Kolkata Knight Riders:

NEW DELHI: Yuzvendra Chahal produced a sensational spell of leg-spin to help Punjab Kings pull off the greatest heist in IPL history, defending a record-low total of 111 to beat Kolkata Knight Riders by 16 runs at Mullanpur on Tuesday.Chahal returned figures of 4/28 as Kolkata, cruising at 62/2 in their chase, collapsed to 95 all out in 15.1 overs. The win lifted Punjab to fourth in the points table with four wins from six matches.KKR looked in control with a 55-run third-wicket stand between Ajinkya Rahane and Angkrish Raghuvanshi before Chahal trapped Rahane lbw and dismissed Raghuvanshi in the next over. He then dismissed Rinku Singh and Ramandeep Singh off successive balls to rattle the middle order.Andre Russell threatened briefly with two sixes and a four off Chahal, but Marco Jansen bowled him to seal a dramatic win. Arshdeep Singh and Jansen claimed key late wickets as Punjab celebrated wildly.Earlier, Punjab had slumped to 111 in 15.3 overs despite a quick start from Priyansh Arya (22) and Prabhsimran Singh (30). Harshit Rana (3/25), Varun Chakravarthy (2/21) and Sunil Narine (2/14) dominated the innings before Punjab’s bowlers turned the tables in one of IPL’s greatest upsets.111 in 15.3 overs in 20 overs (Prabhsimran Singh 30; Harshit Rana 3/25, Varun Chakravarthy 2/21, Sunil Narine 2/14)95 in 15.1 overs (Angkrish Raghuvanshi 37; Yuzvendra Chahal 4/28, Marco Jansen 3/17)
Article Summary: Punjab kings beat kolkata knight riders by 16 runs at mullanpur. Yuzvendra chahal took 4/28 as kkr collapsed to 95 all out in 15.1 overs. The win lifts punjab to fourth in the points table with four wins.

Article Title: Yuzvendra Chahal battles shoulder injury to help Punjab Kings beat Kolkata Knight Riders
Article Text:
Yuzvendra Chahal celebrates a wicket against KKR. (IPL | X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) were cruising in their run-chase before Yuzvendra Chahal turned the game on its head with four quick wickets. Punjab Kings (PBKS) defeated KKR by 16 runs, pulling off one of the greatest heists in IPL history by defending a paltry total of just 111 to stun KKR in Mullanpur.Yuzvendra Chahal led the charge with a masterclass in spin bowling , picking up key wickets at crucial moments.Shreyas Iyer brought Yuzvendra Chahal into the attack in the eighth over, and the veteran spinner struck in his first over. Chahal trapped Rahane, who didn't take the review and walked back. If Rahane had gone to the third umpire, he would have survived, as the impact was outside the off-stump."I will take the blame as the captain of the team. I played the wrong shot; it was missing, but still, I will take the blame. Angkrish Raghuvanshi was not very sure; he said probably it could be umpire's call. I wasn't sure as well, and that was the discussion," Rahane said at the post-match presentation.In his next over, Chahal, who is battling a shoulder injury , got the wicket of the set batter, Angkrish Raghuvanshi."What about Chahal? Simply outstanding. He had a fitness test before this game, with a shoulder injury he picked up in the previous game. I had a chat with him, and he told me, 'coach, I am absolutely fine,'" said coach Ricky Ponting Chahal was on a hat-trick in his third over as he dismissed Rinku Singh and Ramandeep Singh.However, his spell was somewhat spoilt by Andre Russell , who hit two sixes and one boundary in his last over. Chahal finished with magical bowling figures of 4 for 28.Earlier, Punjab Kings were bowled out for a mere 111 in 15.3 overs. Skipper Shreyas Iyer's (0) early dismissal sparked the collapse after PBKS's bright start, which saw their openers Priyansh Arya (22) and Prabhsimran Singh (30) adding 39 runs in 3.1 overs.For KKR, India pacer Harshit Rana took 3/25, Varun Chakravarthy claimed 2/21, and Sunil Narine bagged 2/14.
Article Summary: Punjab kings beat kolkata knight riders (kkr) by 16 runs. Yuzvendra chahal took four quick wickets to turn the game on its head. He was on a hat-trick in his third over as he dismissed rinku singh.

Article Title: WrestleMania 41 streaming details: US, UK, India, Saudi Arabia timings, how to watch, and more
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

Streaming details: How to watch WrestleMania 41?

FULL SEGMENT: Seth Rollins STOMPS CM Punk and Roman Reigns as Heyman watches: Raw, April 14, 2025

Full streaming details with the timings

Full rundown of WrestleMania 41 card

Match card of WrestleMania 41

Also Read

As WWE WrestleMania 41 is just a few days away, WWE has recently revealed the full match card of the premium live event. As per reports, The Show of Shows will witness a total of 12 matches for two full nights at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas, Nevada, from April 19, 2025, and continue till April 20, 2025.Out of the 12 confirmed matches, 5 matches have been confirmed for night one, April 19, 2025, while the other 7 matches will feature on April 20, 2025.The Show of Shows will witness some electrifying performances, intense feuds, and high-voltage drama that will go on in the history of WWE.The entire match card of WWE WrestleMania 41 has been revealed recently, from which it can be comprehended that the show is going to be very interesting in the coming weekends. Now, let’s take a quick look at the streaming details and timings of WrestleMania 41.As for the timing and streaming details, WrestleMania 41 will stream live on Peacock in the United States. The Show of Shows will emanate live at 7 PM ET/4 PM PT on both April 19 and April 20, 2025 originally in the United States, and Canada.However, in other parts of the world, WrestleMania 41 will be broadcast on Netflix and other prominent television channel networks. So, from the actual timing, the other timings and dates may differ a little. Here are the full streaming details with the timings for the Premium Live Event -In the United States, Alaska, Hawaii & Puerto Rico, the show can be watched live at 7 PM ET & 4 PM PT on Peacock. But, you must have their premium or premium-plus subscription to watch it. Internationally, it will be available on Netflix in most markets.-Fans in the UK and Ireland can watch WrestleMania 41 at 12 AM GMT on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025.-In Canada, the show will be broadcast live at 7 PM ET/4 PM PT on Netflix on 19 April 2025 and 20 April 2025.-In India, WWE WrestleMania 41 will be broadcast at 4:30 AM IST on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025.-Viewers in Saudi Arabia can watch the show at 2 AM AST on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025.-In Australia, the show will be broadcast at 10 AM AEDT/ 9 AM AEST only on Netflix on 20 April 2025 and 21 April 2025 on Netflix.According to OTT giant Netflix, WrestleMania 41 will not stream on Netflix in the United States, but members in the following countries can tune in live on Netflix.These countries include: Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Ecuador, Egypt, Finland, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Indonesia, Israel, Kuwait, Malaysia, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Peru, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, and United Kingdom.According to WWE , matches between LA Knight vs Jacob Fatu, Naomi vs Jade Cargill, and Rey Mysterio vs El Grande Americano are all scheduled for the first day on April 19. As per reports, these are the matches that will feature on day 1, along with the Triple-threat match between Reigns vs. Punk vs. Seth Rollins as the main event.Meanwhile, on day 2, matches like the Women’s triple-threat match, Intercontinental Championship, and the much-awaited Cody Rhodes vs. John Cena main event will be the highlight of the premium live event.
Article Summary: Wwe wrestlemania 41 is just a few days away. Wwe has revealed the full match card of the premium live event. The show of shows will witness a total of 12 matches for two full nights at allegiant stadium in las vegas, nevada, from april 19, 2025, and continue till april 20, 2025.

Article Title: “Was pitched differently last year”- Mets’ star Juan Soto breaks his silence on slow start during 2025 MLB season
Article Text:
“Was pitched differently last year”- Mets’ star Juan Soto breaks his silence on slow start during 2025 MLB season (Image Source: Instagram)

Juan Soto opens up on his performance during the 2025 MLB season

“It’s definitely different. I had the best hitter in baseball hitting behind me. I was getting more attacked and more pitches in the strike zone, less intentional walks and things like that. I was pitched differently last year.”

Juan Soto's second homer as a member of the Mets!

“There’s probably some validity to what Soto told Puma about things being ’‘different’—meaning more difficult — without the great Aaron Judge’s lineup protection. But this isn’t the time for that. There may never be a good time for that. But this definitely is not it. When Soto made the comments, before finally homering in Monday’s 5-1 win in Minnesota, he was 15 games into a 15-year commitment.”

After Juan Soto took the exit door from the New York Yankees and joined hands with the Mets during the off-season, he created waves in the MLB world with his $765 million contract. After bagging the biggest deal in the history of the major league, the expectations of the Dominican star skyrocketed. During his debut game with the New York Mets , Soto witnessed a slow start in comparison to what was expected from him and was even subjected to criticism not only from MLB insiders but also from the netizens. Recently, Juan Soto broke his silence on a slow start during the 2025 MLB season.Juan Soto’s start with the New York Mets isn’t that bad, as he not only went on to make 70 plate appearances but also secured a home run under his name against the Minnesota Twins recently. According to a recent update provided by the reputed media outlet The New York Post’s writer Mike Puma, Juan Soto had to face more difficulties during his stint with the Mets in comparison to his time with the New York Yankees along with Aaron Judge . Soto mentionedMLB insider Jon Heyman even reacted to Juan Soto’s statement and even pointed out the protection provided by the Yankees captain Aaron Judge. He said-However, a few games into the 2025 MLB season cannot decide the trajectory of an athlete’s career. With the hype around Juan Soto, undoubtedly the former Yankees star is not only struggling with the expectations of his fans but also the criticism that comes along with being in the spotlight.Also Read: Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani steals the show with walk-off homer leading to franchise record
Article Summary: “was pitched differently last year”- mets’ star juan soto breaks his silence on slow start during 2025 mlb season. When soto made the comments, before finally homering in monday’s 5-1 win in minnesota, he was 15 games into a 15-year commitment.

Article Title: “She ended him”: Taylor Swift didn’t respond to Kanye West but fans think she shut him down back in 2024
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift’s 2024 move against Kanye West has resurfaced amidst the controversial posts, and fans are here for it



Travis Kelce has taken up this matter seriously as he continues to support Taylor Swift



Taylor Swift and Kanye West have continued an ongoing feud which started back in 2009, even though the pop sensation has kept herself away from getting involved in a scandal. While Kanye West’s recent sexually explicit posts about the pop star has sparked an uproar, an old news about the two has resurfaced, and fans feel Taylor Swift had “ended” Kanye West last year.Back in August 2024, Taylor Swift had ended Kanye West’s streak on the Billboard 200 chart .Taylor Swift’s album, The Tortured Poets Department, found itself at the top for the 14th time.This led Kanye West’s popular song, Flashing Light, to fall to the second position and ended his streak of consecutive albums that were always at the top.This news has again resurfaced among fans and they feel this was a perfect “revenge plan” by Taylor Swift.A fan account of Taylor Swift’s shared this old news and wrote, “Remember when taylor swift ended kanye west”.A fan commented, “Reputation TV will end him worse, both chart wise and song wise”, while another fan wrote, “that's why he's mad hahahahah”.A third fan wrote, “notice how she's been outselling kanye since fearless in 2008”, while another user commented, “Good. I hate Kanye. I love Taylor. Kanye shouldn’t have done what he did to Taylor, lying about her.”A fifth user noted, “Yeah I remember how she started outselling him all the way back in 2008”, while another fan wrote, “That was one of the best revenge in history”.A few days back, Kanye West made sexually graphic claims about Taylor Swift’s life, which have now been deleted. One of his posts read as, “Justin Bieber and Harry Styles f***ed Taylor Swift from both sides and didn’t call me. I can’t hold water. ON EVEYTHIIING THIS TWEET IS ONE THOUSAND PERCENT TRUE,”Another post read as, “IM MAD I HAVENT F***ED TAYLOR SWIFT … YET.”As per Daily Mail, there are reports of Taylor Swift filing a cease and desist against him but there have been no confirmations yet from the pop sensation.Travis Kelce has also taken this seriously, according to Daily Mail. A source has revealed, “This time he has gone too far. His claims are not just false they are defamatory.”The source added, “Taylor's clearly upset, and Travis is obviously supporting her. There must be consequences. West would never dare say this to her face.”Also Read: “I feel like me and Taylor might still have s*x”: Kanye West’s sexual remarks about Taylor Swift go back to 2016 - long before his recent posts
Article Summary: Taylor swift’s 2024 move against kanye west has resurfaced amidst the controversial posts, and fans are here for it. A few days back, kanye west made sexually graphic claims about taylor swift's life, which have now been deleted. There are reports of taylor swift filing a cease and desist against him.

Article Title: 'I take the blame': Ajinkya Rahane after KKR's shocking defeat
Article Text:
KKR captain Ajinkya Rahane bats against PBKS in Mullanpur. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

"Nothing to express. We all saw what happened there." Ajinkya Rahane's words, laden with a captain's burden, echoed the disbelief felt by the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) team.Chasing 112 for a win, KKR were comfortably placed at 71 for 3 in 9.1 overs, but they suffered a sensational collapse to be bowled out for 95 in 15.1 overs.In a match where victory seemed assured, KKR succumbed to an inexplicable collapse, gifting Punjab Kings a historic win. Rahane, ever the stoic leader, shouldered the blame. "I will take the blame as the captain of the team. I played the wrong shot, it was missing but still I will take the blame.""Angkrish Raghuvanshi was not pretty sure, he said probably it could be umpire's call. I wasn't sure as well and that was the discussion."KKR captain Rahane held the innings together for a while along with Raghuvanshi, digging into his vast domestic and international experience.Rahane was at his best when he lofted a Bartlett half-volley for a straight six into the sightscreen, taking his side to 55 for 2 at the end of powerplay."Till when I was batting there, we were thinking about 2 points. Wicket was not that easy, 111 was still chaseable. We batted really badly. The bowlers did really well on the surface to restrict a strong Punjab batting line-up for 111," he said.KKR lost seven wickets and scored just 24 runs in six overs after that."As an individual you need to be confident. When we were batting, sweep was very hard to play. Let the ball come and then take your chances. Play cricketing shots and keep that intent going. We were a bit reckless and we need to take full responsibility as a batting unit," said Rahane."Too many things going in my head. It's too early. It was an easy chase for us. When I go upstairs I will try to keep myself really calm and then I will see what to talk to the boys. Half of the tournament is still remaining. We need to be positive and play good brand of cricket. At the same time I would like to address the stuff and move forward."
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders bowled out for 95 in 15.1 overs against punjab kings. Captain ajinkya rahane shouldered the blame for the collapse. Kkr lost seven wickets and scored just 24 runs in six overs after that. Rahane: "too many things going in my head. It's too early"

Article Title: Xavier Bartlett: Who is Xavier Bartlett? Punjab Kings' new pace sensation dismisses Quinton de Kock
Article Text:
Punjab Kings' Xavier Bartlett (c) celebrates with teammates the wicket of KKR's Quinton de Kock. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think Xavier Bartlett will become a key player for PBKS this season? It’s too early to tell No, unlikely Yes, for sure

Does MS Dhoni have any luck left? Greenstone Lobo on CSK's 2025 chances!

NEW DELHI: Australian fast bowler Xavier Bartlett made his Indian Premier League (IPL) debut for Punjab Kings (PBKS) on Tuesday, stepping in for the injured Lockie Ferguson in their clash against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) at Mullanpur, Chandigarh.The 26-year-old was handed the new ball and made an immediate impact, dismissing KKR opener Quinton de Kock in his very first over to claim his maiden IPL wicket.Though PBKS struggled with the bat and were bowled out for just 111 in 15.3 overs, Bartlett contributed with a fighting 11 off 15 balls, including a boundary — one of only five PBKS batters to reach double digits.Hailing from Adelaide, Bartlett rose through the Australian cricketing ranks, starting with under-19 representation before emerging as a key bowler for Queensland. His breakthrough came in the 2023-24 Big Bash League (BBL), where he finished as the tournament’s leading wicket-taker with 20 scalps in 11 games, playing a vital role in Brisbane Heat’s title-winning campaign.Bartlett’s BBL exploits earned him a national call-up. He made his ODI debut on February 2, 2024, followed by his T20I debut on February 13. In just a handful of international matches — 2 ODIs and 7 T20Is — he has already notched up 19 wickets, including two four-wicket hauls in the 50-over format.Punjab Kings secured Bartlett for Rs 80 lakh in the IPL 2025 mega auction in Jeddah.
Article Summary: Xavier bartlett made his ipl debut for punjab kings against kolkata knight riders. The 26-year-old bowler dismissed kkr opener quinton de kock in his very first over to claim his maiden ipl wicket. Bartlett was handed the new ball and made an immediate impact.

Article Title: "He will be the death of me": Joe Burrow steals the spotlight at Sam Hubbard’s wedding as a clip of him goes viral and fans are going crazy over it
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow makes an appearance in a viral video at Sam Hubbard’s wedding and fans are going insane over it



Joe Burrow supported his teammates Ja’Marr Chase and Tee Higgins’ and asked for their contract extensions



Joe Burrow and Sam Hubbard’s friendship goes beyond being teammates in the Cincinnati Bengals . Joe Burrow kept himself busy over the weekend by enjoying his close friend and former teammate Sam Hubbard’s wedding. While Joe Burrow maintains privacy about his life away from the field, fans are desperate for a picture of him from the wedding. Now it seems like the fans’ wish has been granted, and a video of Joe Burrow at Sam Hubbard’s wedding is going viral.Recently, a video of the wedding has gone viral and it seems like it was filmed by a guest who was shocked to spot Joe Burrow. The video has Joe Burrow walking around the venue as he seems to be enjoying the music and interacting with someone and now fans are going crazy about him.A fan commented, “I'm so normal about him 👁🫦👁”, while another fan wrote, “This man will be the death of me”.A third fan wrote, “He looks FAWKING GREAT WHAT”, while another user posted, “I love the joe breadcrumbs during the off-season”.A fifth fan noted, “GOD I MISS THE F**K OUT OF HIM”, as another fan wrote, “HER PANIC IS SOOO REAL. PLEASE LET ME AT HIMMMMMM”.Joe Burrow looked handsome as he opted for a white shirt and black trousers along with a bag. Sam Hubbard also took to his Instagram and posted a picture of him and Joe Burrow as they posed with their other friends.In the last few weeks, the Cincinnati Bengals have been able to offer expensive contract extensions to Ja’Marr Chase and Tee Higgins and all of this has been credited to Joe Burrow.Back in December 2024, Joe Burrow openly advocated for his teammates. The star player said, “I’m confident we are going to be able to do what it takes to bring Tee back. I know that I am going to do what it takes to get him back. So he can have those talks; those are going to be offseason discussions. I think we are excited about that opportunity.”Joe Burrow also spoke highly of Ja’Marr Chase and said, “We feed off each other. We make each other better. We are both really smart players. It is tough to take that away when you have a really smart receiver..."With the trio returning to the field for the upcoming season of the NFL in the next few months, fans are excited to see how it all plays out for the team.Also Read: Joe Burrow makes a rare appearance at Sam Hubbard’s wedding and his "blurry" photos have fans panicking
Article Summary: Joe burrow made a rare appearance at sam hubbard’s wedding. A video of the wedding has gone viral and it seems like it was filmed by a guest who was shocked to spot joe burrow. Fans are going crazy over it and are desperate for a picture of him.

Article Title: “He meant excellence”: Former basketball player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar recalls a core memory while playing to MLB’s first Black player Jackie Robinson
Article Text:
Former basketball player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar recalls a core memory while playing to MLB’s first Black player Jackie Robinson (Image Source: Getty)

Dodgers and Rockies pay tribute to Jackie Robinson

"He meant excellence, giving your all, giving your best, and for all the detractors that are out there, just ignore them and keep on."



Dodgers’ Manager Dave Roberts says he keeps his legacy alive

"It's not just a one-off day, We understand what this man did for our world, our country. This is how you go about life. This is something for me, keeping his legacy burning."

“One of the things Jackie obviously nailed is he realized from an early time that life was going to be hard, he was special and he was put in this certain position to rise above and know that it's not just about the game of baseball. It's bigger than him."

On Tuesday, players and staff members associated with the Los Angeles Dodgers and Colorado Rockies gathered around MLB legend Jackie Robinson ’s statue to remember his legacy. Robinson was the first Black player to play in Major League Baseball. He was the first player ever to break the color barrier 78 years ago with the Brooklyn Dodgers. Every year, people honor the historical impact Robinson brought to the game.Big names like Shohei Ohtani, Mookie Betts, and rookie Roki Sasaki — along with members of the Colorado Rockies, on Tuesday, gathered around MLB legend Jackie Robinson’s statue at Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles, as part of Jackie Robinson Day , which is celebrated across all MLB teams to remember his legacy. The players paid a tribute to the changes Robinson brought to the baseball world.Even Basketball legend Kareem Abdul-Jabbar had joined the Dodgers and Rockies players to honor Robinson. Kareem shared a beautiful core memory from his childhood in Manhattan, when he had proudly worn a Brooklyn Dodgers cap. He even joked that he used to get into fights with Yankees and Giants fans but no one could knock off his cap because he was so tall.When Kareem was young, he was inspired by Jackie Robinson throughout his life. He taught him how to be excellent, work hard, and ignore negativity.He said:On Tuesday, every team that was playing decided to wear the No. 42 jersey, which is the only number universally retired in the majors.The Los Angeles Dodgers’ manager Dave Roberts and Ron Washington of the Los Angeles Angels are the only Black managers in the MLB. Roberts said:He added:Also Read: “Aren’t In The Mood To Hire Black Males” - Former MLB Star Brings Out Real Picture Of Socio-Political Impact On Baseball
Article Summary: On tuesday, players and staff members associated with the los angeles dodgers and colorado rockies gathered around mlb legend jackie robinson ’s statue to remember his legacy. Robinson was the first black player to play in major league baseball. The players paid a tribute to the changes robinson brought to the baseball world.
